==== Computer Lab Status ====

 {*} 2/24/2008<<BR>>
Ubuntu was install on 6 PC's, due to hardware failures and compatibility issues we were unable to install on 8 PC's that we original planed to do. We also had 1 PC added to the setup, a request to get the weight room PC was added to the install. 

A 3com 48 port switch was also installed, as well as new cable runs. We added additional software and user accounts were added.
